SELECT fir_mst_sn,
business_mark AS name
company_name AS name
FROM franchise_basic_info WHERE
business_mark ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
company_name ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
1 = 0
ORDER BY CASE WHEN business_mark ILIKE CONCAT(#{searchWord}, '%') company_name ILIKE CONCAT(#{searchWord}, '%') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, name -- 검색어로 시작하지 않는 경우 알파벳순 정렬

WITH MaxYear AS ( SELECT MAX(report_year) AS max_year FROM franchise_store_status WHERE fir_mst_sn = #{companyNo} -- 원하는 고유번호로 필터링 ) SELECT region AS locale, -- 지역 ROUND(total_stores)::INTEGER AS count -- 전체 매장 수 (정수 변환)
FROM franchise_store_status WHERE report_year = (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear) AND fir_mst_sn = #{companyNo}; -- 원하는 고유번호로 필터링

WITH MaxYear AS ( SELECT MAX(report_year) AS max_year FROM avg_sales_by_region WHERE fir_mst_sn = #{companyNo} ) SELECT fbi.business_mark AS name, fbi.industry AS industry, (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear) AS report_year, ROUND(AVG(asr.avg_sales * 1000 / 12))::BIGINT AS avg_monthly_sales, ROUND(AVG(asr.avg_sales_per_area * 1000 / 12))::BIGINT AS avg_monthly_sales_per_area, COALESCE(ffs.equity, 0) AS equity, COALESCE(ffs.liabilities, 0) AS liabilities FROM franchise_basic_info AS fbi JOIN avg_sales_by_region AS asr ON fbi.fir_mst_sn = asr.fir_mst_sn LEFT JOIN franchise_financial_status AS ffs ON fbi.fir_mst_sn = ffs.fir_mst_sn AND ffs.report_year = (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear) WHERE asr.region = #{region} AND fbi.fir_mst_sn = #{companyNo} AND asr.report_year = (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear) GROUP BY fbi.business_mark, fbi.industry, (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear), ffs.equity, ffs.liabilities

WITH MaxYear AS ( SELECT MAX(report_year) AS max_year FROM avg_sales_by_region ) SELECT fbi.industry AS industry, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN asr.avg_sales IS NOT NULL AND asr.avg_sales > 0 THEN asr.avg_sales * 1000 / 12 END))::BIGINT AS industry_avg_monthly_sales, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN asr.avg_sales_per_area IS NOT NULL AND asr.avg_sales_per_area > 0 THEN asr.avg_sales_per_area * 1000 / 12 END))::BIGINT AS industry_avg_monthly_sales_per_area FROM franchise_basic_info AS fbi JOIN avg_sales_by_region AS asr ON fbi.fir_mst_sn = asr.fir_mst_sn WHERE asr.report_year = (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear) AND asr.region = #{region} AND fbi.industry = #{industry} GROUP BY fbi.industry

WITH MaxYear AS ( SELECT MAX(report_year) AS max_year FROM avg_sales_by_region ) SELECT fbi.fir_mst_sn AS store_id, -- 고유 번호 fbi.business_mark AS store_name, -- 매장명 fbi.industry AS industry, -- 업종명 ROUND(AVG(asr.avg_sales * 1000 / 12))::BIGINT AS avg_monthly_sales, -- 평균 월매출 (만원 단위) COALESCE(SUM(fs.total_stores), 0) AS store_count, -- 매장 수 (전체 또는 선택 지역 기준) ROUND(bc.total * 1000)::BIGINT AS franchise_fee -- 가맹 부담금 FROM avg_sales_by_region AS asr JOIN franchise_basic_info AS fbi ON asr.fir_mst_sn = fbi.fir_mst_sn JOIN franchise_store_status AS fs ON fbi.fir_mst_sn = fs.fir_mst_sn LEFT JOIN burden_costs AS bc ON fbi.fir_mst_sn = bc.fir_mst_sn WHERE asr.avg_sales IS NOT NULL AND asr.report_year = (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear) -- 최신 연도 데이터로 필터링 AND fs.report_year = (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear) -- 최신 연도 데이터로 필터링 AND asr.region = #{region} -- 유저 선택 가능 (지역) AND fs.region = #{region} -- 유저 선택 가능 (지역, asr과 일치시켜야 함)
AND fbi.industry = #{industry} -- 업종 필터링 (전체가 아닐 경우에만 적용)
AND bc.total IS NOT NULL AND bc.total > 0 GROUP BY fbi.fir_mst_sn, fbi.business_mark, fbi.industry, bc.total ORDER BY avg_monthly_sales DESC LIMIT #{limit}; -- 유저 선택 가능 (조회 개수)

WITH MaxYear AS ( SELECT MAX(report_year) AS max_year FROM avg_sales_by_region ) SELECT fbi.industry AS industry, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN asr.avg_sales IS NOT NULL AND asr.avg_sales > 0 THEN asr.avg_sales * 1000 / 12 END))::BIGINT AS industry_avg_monthly_sales, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN asr.avg_sales_per_area IS NOT NULL AND asr.avg_sales_per_area > 0 THEN asr.avg_sales_per_area * 1000 / 12 END))::BIGINT AS industry_avg_monthly_sales_per_area FROM franchise_basic_info AS fbi JOIN avg_sales_by_region AS asr ON fbi.fir_mst_sn = asr.fir_mst_sn WHERE asr.report_year = (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear) AND asr.region = #{region} GROUP BY fbi.industry ORDER BY industry_avg_monthly_sales DESC

WITH MaxYear AS ( SELECT MAX(report_year) AS max_year FROM franchise_changes ) SELECT fbi.industry AS industry, -- 업종명 COALESCE(SUM(fc.new_openings), 0) AS new_openings_count -- 신규 개점 수 FROM franchise_changes AS fc JOIN franchise_basic_info AS fbi ON fc.fir_mst_sn = fbi.fir_mst_sn WHERE fc.report_year = (SELECT max_year FROM MaxYear) GROUP BY fbi.industry ORDER BY new_openings_count DESC

SELECT fbi.fir_mst_sn AS store_id, -- 고유 번호 fbi.business_mark AS store_name, -- 매장명 ROUND(bc.entry_fee * 1000)::BIGINT AS entry_fee, -- 가입비 ROUND(bc.education_fee * 1000)::BIGINT AS education_fee, -- 교육비 ROUND(bc.deposit * 1000)::BIGINT AS deposit, -- 보증금 ROUND(bc.other_costs * 1000)::BIGINT AS other_costs, -- 기타비용 ROUND(bc.total * 1000)::BIGINT AS franchise_fee, -- 가맹 부담금 총합 ROUND(ic.unit_area_cost * 1000)::BIGINT AS unit_area_cost, -- 단위면적당 인테리어 비용 ic.standard_store_area AS standard_store_area, -- 기준점포면적 ROUND(ic.interior_cost * 1000)::BIGINT AS interior_cost -- 인테리어 비용 FROM franchise_basic_info AS fbi LEFT JOIN burden_costs AS bc ON fbi.fir_mst_sn = bc.fir_mst_sn LEFT JOIN interior_costs AS ic ON fbi.fir_mst_sn = ic.fir_mst_sn WHERE fbi.fir_mst_sn = #{companyNo} AND bc.total IS NOT NULL;
